item.title: The Pentagon has ordered 3,000 more troops to Poland, bringing the total number of reinforcements sent to Europe in the past two weeks to 5,000. The move will be to reassure NATO allies that the U.S. would protect them from Russian aggression. https://t.co/Y6LBqiEjTP
